entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or snow. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow or rain changing to rain this evening and ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers. Fog patches developing early this evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm.
